markdownRemark.html: CBS, The British School of Seville - Situated in Seville. Co-ed day (3-18 years). English National Curriculum education, but Spanish culture is also an integral part of the education system and subjects such as Spanish Language and Literature, History and Geography follow the same levels as the Spanish Educational System.
